Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Presentation of the Lord Christ in the Temple:

Text.Language: You were carried in the arms of Your servant Simeon / In your grasp, are death and life / Simeon called â€œLet me depart according to Your Word / In peaceâ€?, he was released from the bonds of life.
